description: Arachnoides (Arachniodes simplicior ‘Variegata’) is an eye-catching evergreen fern with lattice-shaped leaflets and margins heavily fringed with white, making it look like it has been delicately painted. It's an amazing plant to add some texture and interest to any woodland, mixed border, or even a rock garden with its vivid variegation. This evergreen fern is also very hardy and grows well in shady, moist, acidic soil, making it extremely easy to take care of. Its bright, feathery foliage will light up any dark corner of the garden. Arachnoides (Arachniodes simplicior ‘Variegata’) is an amazing plant to add some excitement to your garden.
